Mavis Summarizer is a Chrome extension that offers real-time text summarization capabilities using 8 different artificial intelligence (AI) models. The extension allows users to quickly get the gist of various online content, such as articles, reports, or other long documents, without having to read the entire text. By harnessing the power of multiple AI models, Mavis Summarizer provides accurate and comprehensive summaries, helping users save time and increase efficiency in understanding important information.

Developer:
Moch. Gustav Ali Rafsandjani	
Sayyidah Fatimah Azzahra	
Ikbar Razan Nashrullah	
Naufal Romero	
Christopher Robin Tanugroho
